name: *Skeleton Key*
author: neitherrhyme
desc:
Spending ten minutes with a door, you create a magical key attuned to that door.

This key may be placed in any door; if you do so, the key will disappear and the door it is placed in will open into a one-way portal to the attuned door for the next hour, or until either door is closed or destroyed.

A caster may only maintain one instance of Skeleton Key, and only one instance of Skeleton Key may be attuned to a given door.
